content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, with furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS, with fuel inventory (2 coal) and furnace_result containing 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status: NO_POWER, and electrical_id updated to 11728.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status: NOT_CONNECTED, with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”, and neighbours including pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5), and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 200 units of water at 15°; status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), and steam_output at (-7.5, 24.5), operating under fluid_system [43796].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) drawing water with a fluid_box holding approximately 100 units at 15°; status: WORKING, with connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) and fluid_system [43796].
- Pipeline Network comprising multiple PipeGroups:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43796 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43797 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43798 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43803 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43802 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43807 at position(3.5, 25.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43806 at position(2.5, 24.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=43809 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Failures with Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
  • Repeated connection attempts using fluid_system values [43452, 43495, 43538, 43581, 43624, 43667, 43710, 43753] resulted in no working PipeGroup.
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and verify the active PipeGroup’s fluid_system identifier from the current pipeline network before attempting a connection.
- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • Using preset fluid_system values without runtime verification leads to aborted connection attempts.
  • Tip: Implement validation of the network’s fluid configuration prior to pipeline connection.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains unfueled, disrupting the steam cycle.
  • Tip: Replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory promptly to ensure continuous operation.
